value:
Why don't you wear armor? Seems
dangerous. Those odd clothes you
wear can't protect you, you know.

I'm an Altean knight. I wear this
heavy armor of mine so I can
protect Prince Marth.

You always seem so busy—are you
taking time to relax? You shouldn't
push yourself.

I'd feel a lot better if you wore
heavy armor like me, but...you might
not be able to move if you did!

Hmm... Lately I feel like my armor
doesn't fit quite right...

Excuse me. Are you in charge?
I've come to deliver a greeting
from $Nf.
Soon I'll be the ultimate protector!

Very nice. This will toughen up
my defenses.

Got to train harder if I’m going to
protect everyone!

Now I can protect even more of
our allies.

I'm Draug, an Altean knight.
My armor and I will stand between
our enemies and our allies.

I've always concentrated more on
protecting my allies than defeating
our enemies.$k$pThat's why I appreciate what you
do on the battlefield.$k$pI see that you care about everyone
and want to keep them safe.$k$pI think together we can protect
a lot of people. Count on me to
help.
むぅんっ！
でぇい！
うああっ！
W-what!
I'll stand my ground!
Out of my way!
None shall pass!
For my liege!
Fight on...
Haha
Did you need me?
If you need me, just say so.
Do I have something on my face?
I'd like to stay by your side to the end.
This armor and I have been through a lot together.
There's someone I've sworn to protect above all others.
Let me be your shield. It’s what I do.
Understood.
Hmm...
Where to?
